trans-unit.source: Frame is a content control that supports navigation.
trans-unit.target: 框架是一种支持导航的内容控件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> is a content control that provides the ability to navigate to and display content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> 是提供能够导航到并显示内容的内容控件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> can be hosted within other content, as with other controls and elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> 可以与其他控件和元素承载于其他内容。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> control navigates to HTML content, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> control internally instantiates the native WebBrowser ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>控件导航到 HTML 内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>控件内部实例化本机 WebBrowser ActiveX 控件。

trans-unit.source: WPF enables security features by applying feature controls to the WebBrowser ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: WPF 通过将功能控制应用于的 WebBrowser ActiveX 控件中启用安全功能。

trans-unit.source: The feature controls that are applied differ for XBAPs and stand-alone applications.
trans-unit.target: 应用的功能控件不同于 Xbap 和独立应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Some applications should apply additional feature controls to prevent malicious content from running.
trans-unit.target: 某些应用程序应该应用附加功能控制以防止运行恶意内容。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "WebBrowser Control and Feature Controls" section in [Security (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md) and [WebBrowser Control Overviews and Tutorials](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=179388).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"web 浏览器控件和功能控件"一节[安全性 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md)和[WebBrowser 控件概述和教程](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=179388)。

trans-unit.source: Content can be any type of .NET Framework object and HTML files.
trans-unit.target: 内容可以是任何类型的.NET Framework 对象和 HTML 文件。

trans-unit.source: In general, however, pages are the preferred the way to package content for navigation (see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>).
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下，但是，页面是首选导航的包内容的方式 (请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>)。

trans-unit.source: Content can be navigated to by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A> property with the URI for the desired content.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置情况下，内容可以导航到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A>的所需内容的 uri 的属性。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, content can be navigated to by using one of the following overloads of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%2A> method:
trans-unit.target: 此外，内容可以导航到使用的以下重载之一<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%2A>方法：

trans-unit.source: When content is navigated to by URI, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> returns an object that contains the content.
trans-unit.target: 通过 URI，导航到内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>返回包含内容的对象。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, content can be navigated to by using one of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%2A> method overloads that accepts an object:
trans-unit.target: 或者，内容可以导航到使用之一<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%2A>接受对象的方法重载：

trans-unit.source: The lifetime of a navigation can be tracked through the following events:
trans-unit.target: 导航的生存期可以跟踪通过以下事件：

trans-unit.source: Not all events are raised each time that a navigation occurs; the set of events that are raised is determined by the type of navigation that occurs (content or content fragment) and how the navigation completes (canceled, stopped, or failed).
trans-unit.target: 并非所有事件都引发发生导航; 每次（取消、 已停止，或失败），将由导航发生 （内容或内容片段） 和如何完成导航的类型确定的一套引发的事件。

trans-unit.source: The following figure illustrates the sequence in which these events will fire:
trans-unit.target: 下图说明了这些事件的激发顺序的序列：

trans-unit.source: ![Page navigation flow chart](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "Page navigation flow chart")
trans-unit.target: ![页面导航流程图](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "页面导航流程图")

trans-unit.source: During or after a navigation, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> provides information about the content that is being navigated to, including the URI of the content being navigated to (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A>), the URI of the current content (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CurrentSource%2A>), and an object that contains the content that was navigated to (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 期间或之后导航窗格中，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>提供信息，其中包括要导航到内容的 URI 导航目标的内容 (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A>)，当前内容的 URI (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CurrentSource%2A>)，并包含的对象导航到的内容 (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: When content is navigated to, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> records the navigation as an entry in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 在内容导航到时,<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>导航历史记录中记录为条目的导航。

trans-unit.source: An entry is added to back navigation history when either a new navigation occurs, by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%2A> method, or by navigating to an entry in forward navigation history, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.GoForward%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个条目后退导航历史记录，新导航时，通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%2A>方法，或通过导航到前进导航历史记录中的项通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.GoForward%2A>。

trans-unit.source: An entry is added to forward navigation history by navigating to an entry in back navigation history, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.GoBack%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 条目添加到前进导航历史记录上，通过导航到条目后退导航历史记录，通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.GoBack%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CanGoBack%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CanGoForward%2A> report whether there are entries in back and forward navigation history, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CanGoBack%2A> 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CanGoForward%2A>报告是否存在条目后退和前进导航历史记录，分别。

trans-unit.source: The first time that one piece of content is navigated to from another piece of content, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> automatically displays a navigation UI that allows users to navigate back and forward through navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 第一次一段的内容导航到另一段内容，从<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>会自动显示导航用户界面，使用户能够向后导航并前进导航历史记录。

trans-unit.source: You can configure when the navigation UI is shown by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationUIVisibility%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以配置导航 UI 会在显示时通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationUIVisibility%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> will use its own navigation history only if a parent navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) with its own navigation history cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>仅当父导航器将使用其自己的导航历史记录 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) 无法找到其自己的导航历史记录。

trans-unit.source: This means that navigation history entries for the frame are mingled with navigation history entries for the parent navigator.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，帧的导航历史记录条目混合在一起导航历史记录条目与为父导航器。

trans-unit.source: To specify that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> manages its own navigation history, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership.OwnsJournal>.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>管理其自己导航历史记录中，设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership.OwnsJournal>。

trans-unit.source: The most recent entry in back navigation history can be removed by calling <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.RemoveBackEntry%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 最新条目后退导航历史记录可能会通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.RemoveBackEntry%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> 不导航历史记录中存储内容的对象的实例。

trans-unit.source: Instead, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>创建使用导航历史记录导航到每次的内容对象的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: 此行为旨在时较大数字和大片的内容要导航到避免过多的内存消耗。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next.
trans-unit.target: 因此，内容的状态将不会保留从一个导航到下一步。

trans-unit.source: However, WPF provides several techniques by which you can store a state for a piece of content in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 但是，WPF 提供了几种方法，使您可以导航历史记录中存储的一段内容的状态。

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.AddBackEntry%2A>, you can also remember multiple sets of state for a single page instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.AddBackEntry%2A>，您还可以保留多个集的单个页面实例的状态。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the Frame Control
trans-unit.target: 自定义框架控件

trans-unit.source: To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要将相同的属性设置应用于多个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>控件，使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改默认<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>提供独特外观的控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, see [Frame Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/frame-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的部件和特定于状态<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>，请参阅[框架样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/frame-styles-and-templates.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的依赖项属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性设置的默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值，如果控件出现在应用程序中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 桌面主题用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 设置 visual 属性会仅造成影响该属性是否都存在于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>控件的默认模板，并通过设置。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 可以在的"更改 Visual 结构的控件"一节中找到的可视属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有的控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a simple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> control and specify initial source content to load from a URI using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建一个简单<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>控件并指定要加载从 URI 使用的初始源内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> object that represents application-defined state that is associated with a specific piece of content.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> 对象，该对象表示与特定内容片段关联的应用程序定义的状态。

trans-unit.source: Adds an entry to back navigation history that contains a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 向包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> 对象的后退导航历史记录中添加一个条目。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="state" /> is <see langword="null" />, and a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> object is not returned from <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState.GetContentState" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="state" /> 为 <see langword="null" />，并且未从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState" /> 返回一个 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Navigation.IProvideCustomContentState.GetContentState" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的子对象。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: 添加子对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden because <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> does not allow children.
trans-unit.target: 此方法被重写，因为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>不允许子级。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property to set content.
trans-unit.target: 请改用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>属性来设置内容。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到对象的文本。

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: 将节点的文本内容添加到对象。

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden to prevent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> from adding text.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以防止<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>从添加文本。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> that you use to enumerate the entries in back navigation history for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" />，用于枚举 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> 的后退导航历史记录中的条目。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> if at least one entry has been added to back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 如果至少向后退导航历史记录中添加了一个条目，则为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" />。

trans-unit.source: If there are not entries, or the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> does not own its own navigation history, <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.BackStack" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有条目，或者 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> 没有自己的导航历史记录，则 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.BackStack" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The entries that are returned by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.BackStack%2A> including whole content, fragment navigations, and custom state.
trans-unit.target: 通过返回的条目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.BackStack%2A>包括整个内容、 片段导航和自定义状态。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.BackStack" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.BackStack" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.BackStack%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.BackStack%2A> 依赖项属性的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> 的基 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The base [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> 控件的基 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.BaseUri%2A> can be set to aid resolution of relative [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] for further navigation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.BaseUri%2A> 可以设置以帮助解决方法的相对[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]进一步导航。

trans-unit.source: To get or set the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> control, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 要获取或设置[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>控制，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: This is protected virtual property and cannot be used directly, although can be used in derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 这是受保护的虚拟属性，不能直接使用，虽然可以在派生类中使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there is at least one entry in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示后退导航历史记录中是否至少有一个条目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is at least one entry in back navigation history; <see langword="false" /> if there are no entries in back navigation history or the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> does not own its own navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 如果后退导航历史记录中至少有一个条目，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果后退导航历史记录中没有条目，或者 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> 没有自己的导航历史记录，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CanGoBack" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CanGoBack" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CanGoBack%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CanGoBack%2A> 依赖项属性的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there is at least one entry in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示前进导航历史记录中是否至少有一个条目。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is at least one entry in forward navigation history; <see langword="false" /> if there are no entries in forward navigation history or the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> does not own its own navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 如果前进导航历史记录中至少有一个条目，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果前进导航历史记录中没有条目，或者 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> 没有自己的导航历史记录，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CanGoForward%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CanGoForward%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CanGoForward" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CanGoForward" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CanGoForward%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.CanGoForward%2A> 依赖项属性的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> content has been rendered.
trans-unit.target: 在呈现了 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> 内容之后发生。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> has no content, this event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>没有任何内容，则不会引发此事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the content that was last navigated to.
trans-unit.target: 获取上次导航到的内容的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> for the content that was last navigated to, if navigated to by using a URI; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Uri" />内容的最后导航到，如果导航到使用 URI; 否则为<see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CurrentSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CurrentSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> that you use to enumerate the entries in forward navigation history for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" />，用于枚举 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> 的前进导航历史记录中的条目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> object if at least one entry has been added to forward navigation history, or <see langword="null" /> if there are no entries or the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> does not own its own navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 如果前进导航历史记录中至少添加了一个条目，则为 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 对象；如果没有条目，或者 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> 没有自己的导航历史记录，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The entries that are returned by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.ForwardStack%2A> including whole content, fragment navigations, and custom state.
trans-unit.target: 通过返回的条目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.ForwardStack%2A>包括整个内容、 片段导航和自定义状态。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.ForwardStack" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.ForwardStack" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.ForwardStack%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.ForwardStack%2A> 依赖项属性的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when navigation to a content fragment begins, which occurs immediately, if the desired fragment is in the current content, or after the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] content has been loaded, if the desired fragment is in different content.
trans-unit.target: 当开始导航到某个内容片段时发生，如果所需片段位于当前内容中，它会立即发生；或者，如果所需片段位于不同内容中，它会在加载了源 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] 内容之后发生。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the most recent item in back navigation history, if a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> manages its own navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> 管理自己的导航历史记录，则导航到后退导航历史记录中最近的项。

trans-unit.source: If navigation history for a frame is managed by a parent navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>), the `GoBack` method on that navigator or associated <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> object must be called:
trans-unit.target: 如果由父导航器管理某个帧的导航历史记录 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>)，则`GoBack`该导航器的方法或关联<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>必须调用对象：

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.GoBack" /> is called when there are no entries in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.GoBack" /> 时后退导航历史记录中没有条目。

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the most recent item in forward navigation history, if a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> manages its own navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> 管理自己的导航历史记录，则导航到前进导航历史记录中最近的项。

trans-unit.source: If navigation history for a frame is managed by a parent navigator (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>), the `GoForward` method on that navigator or associated <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> object must be called:
trans-unit.target: 如果由父导航器管理某个帧的导航历史记录 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>)，则`GoForward`该导航器的方法或关联<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>必须调用对象：

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.GoForward" /> is called when there are no entries in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.GoForward" /> 时后退导航历史记录中没有条目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> is responsible for managing its own navigation history, or yields navigation history management to a parent navigator (<see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" />).
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> 是负责管理自己的导航历史记录，还是将导航历史记录的管理工作交给父导航器 (<see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" />、<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" />) 负责。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership" /> value that specifies whether <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> manages its own journal.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership" /> 值，该值指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> 是否管理自己的日记。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership.Automatic" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership.Automatic" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> will use its own navigation history only if a parent navigation host (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) with its own journal cannot be found (for example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> is hosted in content that is hosted by a <xref:System.Windows.Window>).
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>仅当父导航主机将使用其自己的导航历史记录 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>) 找不到与它自己的日志 (例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>由承载的内容中承载<xref:System.Windows.Window>)。

trans-unit.source: To force <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> to manage its own navigation history, set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership.OwnsJournal>.
trans-unit.target: 若要强制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>要管理其自己的导航历史记录，将设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership.OwnsJournal>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> that is configured to use its own navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>配置为使用其自己的导航历史记录。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> 依赖项属性的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when content that was navigated to has been loaded, parsed, and has begun rendering.
trans-unit.target: 当已加载、分析并开始呈现目标导航内容时发生。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Navigates asynchronously to the specified source content.
trans-unit.target: 异步导航到指定的源内容。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the content to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，其中包含要导航到的内容。

trans-unit.source: Navigates asynchronously to content that is contained by an object.
trans-unit.target: 异步导航到包含在某个对象中的内容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果未取消导航，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to navigate to content that is contained by an object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何导航到包含在某个对象的内容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> object initialized with the URI for the desired content.
trans-unit.target: 使用所需内容的 URI 初始化的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Navigates asynchronously to content that is specified by a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 异步导航到由[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] 指定的内容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果未取消导航，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#initcap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpinitcapsharpplural-md.md)] can be either relative or absolute.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#initcap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpinitcapsharpplural-md.md)] 可以是相对或绝对。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [WPF 中的 Pack URI](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%2A> method to navigate to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Navigate%2A>方法可导航到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the content to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，其中包含要导航到的内容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，其中包含要在导航过程中进行处理的数据。

trans-unit.source: Navigates asynchronously to content that is contained by an object, and passes an object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: 异步导航到包含在某个对象中的内容，并传递一个对象，该对象包含要在导航过程中进行处理的数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果未取消导航，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> object initialized with the URI for the desired content.
trans-unit.target: 使用所需内容的 URI 初始化的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，其中包含要在导航过程中进行处理的数据。

trans-unit.source: Navigates asynchronously to source content located at a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)], and passes an object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: 异步导航到位于某个 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] 的源内容，并传递一个对象，该对象包含要在导航过程中进行处理的数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果未取消导航，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content that is being navigated to has been found, and is available from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> property, although it may not have completed loading.
trans-unit.target: 找到导航的目标内容且可通过 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> 属性得到这些内容时发生，即使尚未加载完毕也是如此。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new navigation is requested.
trans-unit.target: 请求新导航时发生。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an error is raised while navigating to the requested content.
trans-unit.target: 在导航到所需内容的同时遇到错误时发生。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs periodically during a download to provide navigation progress information.
trans-unit.target: 在下载过程中定期发生，用于提供定位进度信息。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService" /> that is used by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> to provide navigation services.
trans-unit.target: 获取此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService" /> 用来提供导航服务的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> object that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService" /> used by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" />, if one is available.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> 对象，它表示此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService" /> 使用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" />（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <see langword="null" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 否则将返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> uses <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> to support navigation for hosted content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> 使用<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>为托管内容导航提供支持。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A> is useful for code that hosts a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> to get a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A> 可用于承载代码可<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>获取对引用<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>。

trans-unit.source: Content that is hosted by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>, should use <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A> to get a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>.
trans-unit.target: 由承载的内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>，如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>，应使用<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A>获取对引用<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A> does not return a reference to the same <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A> as calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A> and passing <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> does.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A> 不返回对相同的引用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A>与调用<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A>并传递<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>未。

trans-unit.source: The former returns the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A> that is owned by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> while the latter returns the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A> for the navigation host that navigated to the content in which the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> is hosted.
trans-unit.target: 前者返回<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A>由拥有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>而后者返回<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationService%2A>导航到在其中的内容导航主机<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>承载。

trans-unit.source: The following code demonstrates the differences.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示了差异。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.StopLoading" /> method is called, or when a new navigation is requested while a current navigation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.StopLoading" /> 方法时发生，或者在当前导航正处于进行过程中时又请求一个新导航时发生。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> can show its navigation UI.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> 何时可以显示其导航 UI。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationUIVisibility" /> value that specifies when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> can show its navigation UI.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationUIVisibility" />值，该值指定当<see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" />可以显示其导航用户界面。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationUIVisibility.Automatic" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationUIVisibility.Automatic" />。

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> shows its navigation UI automatically when the first entry is added to navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>自动显示其导航用户界面时的第一个条目添加到导航历史记录。

trans-unit.source: The navigation UI subsequently remains visible, with the back or forward navigation buttons becoming appropriately enabled or disabled to reflect the number of entries in back and forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 导航用户界面随后保持可见，并会后退或向前导航按钮变得相应地启用或禁用以反映的项数后退和前进导航历史记录。

trans-unit.source: You can ensure that navigation UI is always visible by setting:
trans-unit.target: 你可以确保导航 UI 始终可见通过设置：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationUIVisibility> to <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationUIVisibility.Visible>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationUIVisibility> 至 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationUIVisibility.Visible>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership.OwnsJournal>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.JournalOwnership%2A> 至 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership.OwnsJournal>

trans-unit.source: You set <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationUIVisibility> to <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationUIVisibility.Hidden> if you want to hide the navigation UI.
trans-unit.target: 你设置<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationUIVisibility>到<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationUIVisibility.Hidden>如果你想要隐藏导航用户界面。

trans-unit.source: This might be the case when navigation UI doesn’t make sense with the content you are displaying from a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>, or because you are providing your own navigation UI.
trans-unit.target: 这可能是这种情况，当导航用户界面不会从显示的内容的意义上<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>，或者是因为你要提供自己导航用户界面。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to make sure the navigation chrome of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> is always visible by setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationUIVisibility%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationUIVisibility.Visible>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何确保的导航镶边<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>将始终显示通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationUIVisibility%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationUIVisibility.Visible>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationUIVisibility" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationUIVisibility" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationUIVisibility%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.NavigationUIVisibility%2A> 依赖项属性的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Called when the template generation for the visual tree is created.
trans-unit.target: 在为可视化树创建模板生成时调用。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.ContentRendered" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.ContentRendered" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.OnContentRendered%2A> raises the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.ContentRendered> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.OnContentRendered%2A> 引发 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.ContentRendered> 事件。

trans-unit.source: A type that derives from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> may override <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.OnContentRendered%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 派生自类型<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>可能会重写<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.OnContentRendered%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The overridden method must call <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.OnContentRendered%2A> on the base class if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.ContentRendered> needs to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 重写的方法必须调用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.OnContentRendered%2A>基本类如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.ContentRendered>需要引发。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.NavigationWindowAutomationPeer" /> object for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" />.
trans-unit.target: 为此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.NavigationWindowAutomationPeer" /> 创建并返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.NavigationWindowAutomationPeer" /> object for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.NavigationWindowAutomationPeer" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法重写 <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Reloads the current content.
trans-unit.target: 重新加载当前内容。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Removes the most recent journal entry from back history.
trans-unit.target: 移除后退历史记录中的最新日记条目。

trans-unit.source: The most recent <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry" /> in back navigation history, if there is one.
trans-unit.target: 后退导航历史记录中的最新 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry" />（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> isolates external [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] content within a partial trust security sandbox (with the default <see langword="Internet" /> permission set).
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" /> 是否在一个部分信任的安全沙盒（具有默认的 <see langword="Internet" /> 权限集）中隔离外部 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 内容。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if content is isolated within a partial trust security sandbox; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在一个部分信任的安全沙盒中隔离内容，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: External content is [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] content that is not included with an application as either a resource file or a content file (see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)).
trans-unit.target: 外部内容是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]未附随一个应用程序作为资源文件或内容文件的内容 (请参阅[WPF 应用程序资源、 内容和数据文件](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md))。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.SandboxExternalContent%2A> is `true`, and the source for the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> is an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file, the content is loaded into a partial trust security sandbox that is limited to the default `Internet` permission set.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.SandboxExternalContent%2A>是`true`，和内容的源<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>是外部[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]文件时，内容加载到仅限于默认值的部分信任安全沙盒`Internet`权限集。

trans-unit.source: The external content is subsequently loaded into a separate process.
trans-unit.target: 外部内容随后加载到单独的进程。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the external content becomes isolated and does not have access to application-scope resources, such as resource dictionaries (see <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>).
trans-unit.target: 因此，外部的内容将被隔离，不能应用程序范围内的资源，例如资源字典的访问 (请参阅<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>)。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> will only contain external content when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A> property is set to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> 将仅包含外部内容时<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A>属性设置为[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]为外部[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]文件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> content that is provided using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property is considered internal content and, subsequently, is not isolated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> 使用提供的内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>属性被视为内部内容，并随后，不会被隔离。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.SandboxExternalContent" /> is set when an application is executing in partial trust.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序在部分信任的环境中执行时，将设置 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.SandboxExternalContent" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.SandboxExternalContent" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.SandboxExternalContent" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.SandboxExternalContent%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.SandboxExternalContent%2A> 依赖项属性的标识符。

trans-unit.source: Allows derived classes to determine the serialization behavior of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 允许派生类确定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> 属性的序列化行为。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the content should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果内容应序列化，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current content, or the URI of new content that is currently being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前内容的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]，或当前正在导航到的新内容的 URI。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that contains the URI for the current content, or the content that is currently being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> ，其中包含当前的内容，或当前导航到的内容 URI。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#initcap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpinitcapsharpplural-md.md)] can be either relative or absolute.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#initcap#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpinitcapsharpplural-md.md)] 可以是相对或绝对。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [WPF 中的 Pack URI](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to navigate to a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何导航到[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Frame.Source" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Stops further downloading of content for the current navigation request.
trans-unit.target: 停止为当前导航请求下载更多内容。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅 <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext.BaseUri" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext.BaseUri" />。

trans-unit.source: The base URI of the current context.
trans-unit.target: 当前上下文的基 URI。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> 接口时使用。
